title: Bug 120291Data source and data set extended from library in a report are invalid.
description: Noticed that their names are different from the names in library.2. I want to use the data source extended from library to create a new data set.
OB: Bug 120291Data source and data set extended from library in a report are invalid. The data source is invalid.3. The data set from library is also invalid. When editing it, NullPointerException is thrown out.
SR: Description: Data source and data set extended from library in a report are invalid.Steps to reproduce:1. Drag a data source and data set from library explorer view.
